game.name: Mon Bazou
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Build your crappy vehicle into a race car, install the parts yourself. Make money by cutting wood, racing at night or delivering pizza. Maybe you want to manage a sugar shack or build yourself a big garage?
